description: Erection of single storey rear extension (4.75m in depth, maximum height of 3.74m and eaves height of 2.26m)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension together with the existing enlargement would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and the total enlargement would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (ja) and (j) (iii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Condition 3 (External Materials) - Condition 3 of permission 20/01857/HOU states;The development shall be constructed in accordance with the following details which shall have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to above ground works and shall thereafter be permanently retained:(a) materials for all external finishes (including their manufacturer(s) specification, dimensions, colour and texture).(b) boundary treatment, (including walls, fences and gates) with regards to their manufacturer(s) specification, dimensions, colour and texture)Officers are unable to support the discharge of this condition as no information regarding boundary treatments has been provided.

Due to a web malfunction any documents that were submitted via the website are irretrievable. Please could you resend any associated/supporting documents via email. Please accept our apologies for this inconvenience.
